ViewObject.Name: OD_ProjectResourceLOVVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT fu.user_id user_id, fu.user_name, papf.first_name || ' ' || papf.last_name full_name, papf.person_id person_id, papf.employee_number employee_number FROM qa_results qr, qa_plans qp, fnd_user_view fu, fnd_user_view fu2, hr_organization_units hou, fnd_user fndu, per_all_people_f papf WHERE qp.name = 'OD_PB_RESOURCE_ALLOCATION' AND qp.plan_id = qr.plan_id AND (qr.character5 = fu.user_name OR qr.character6 = fu.user_name OR qr.character7 = fu.user_name OR qr.character8 = fu.user_name OR qr.character9 = fu.user_name OR qr.character10 = fu.user_name OR qr.character11 = fu.user_name OR qr.character12 = fu.user_name OR qr.character13 = fu.user_name OR qr.character14 = fu.user_name OR qr.character15 = fu.user_name OR qr.character16 = fu.user_name OR qr.character17 = fu.user_name OR qr.character18 = fu.user_name OR qr.character19 = fu.user_name ) AND qr.qa_last_updated_by = fu2.user_id AND qr.organization_id = hou.organization_id AND (qr.status IS NULL OR qr.status = 2) AND fndu.user_id = fu.user_id AND papf.person_id = fndu.employee_id GROUP BY fu.user_id, fu.user_name, papf.first_name, papf.last_name, papf.person_id, papf.employee_number
